level.text: The Mayor shall create a report that shall include:
School-level data collected through the early warning and support system for each participating feeder school group;
Recommendations highlighting best practices to improve high school and college readiness and increase high school graduation rates among all schools, including the feeder school groups; and
A plan to expand the early warning and support system to all schools within 3 years of June 19, 2012.
The report shall be submitted to the Council one year after implementation of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-142, see notes under ยง 38-751.01.
